title: Arena: NA Spring Finals Caster Diary

replies.body: This was very well done. I always love getting to know more about the people we see on screen.

The photography is _fantastic_.

Love the casters too! It was great getting to see a day in each of their lives!
I really dig that Phreak watches the matches with one ear off to incorporate crowd reactions attributed to sweet plays.

It always looks like these guys have the best job ever. I'm glad to see that while it does obviously have its challenges, the job really is great and their effort goes noticed. Keep up the great work, guys!
So that's why he's called "Pastrytime".
This is great - don't think this content goes unnoticed!  Keep it up!
I found myself reading pastry's diary in his accent {{item:2010}}
NA casters bring an absolute massive amount of  hype to games. Their level of excitement is really fun to hear and see.
Absolutely my favorite analyst
I really love these. I'd really like to know the name name of the photographer!
Julian looks like he's having the time of his life! It reflects the workmanship and the passion
Super Cool!
TSM Jatt
I love you jatt. Fun to lean more about the cool people who I have grown so fond of.
I would give my left nut to spend some time with pastrytime{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} , best caster of the bunch.

This article was really well done! Loved getting to see the behind the scenes look. I also really enjoyed that they wrote it themselves. It made it feel like I was right there with them.  I want to meet and pet Jatt's cats! The bakery place that Pastrytime was in looked extremely delicious! The photos, the writing, the captions and just everything about this was excellent! I hope that they do this with the rest of the NA LCS casters and analysts and possibly the EU ones as well.
Love this!
awesome time there at Vancouver :D
I see cat I like it
hi
how long after a 25-game chat restriction do I have to reform before a 2-week ban
